viewtier.ui
Interface StatelessTierlet

All Superinterfaces:
Tierlet
public interface StatelessTierlet
extends Tierlet

StatelessTierlet is a signature interface. Tierlet implementing this interface guarantees existance of only instance of tierlet throughout the client session

Every Tierlet must implement either StatelessTierlet or ConversationalTierlet siganture interfaces.

See Also:
ConversationalTierlet

Inner Class Summary
static class StatelessTierlet.Result
          StatelessTierlet.Result is a naming convinience class to hold strongly typed result codes returned by StatelessTierlet excecute method.
 
Method Summary
 StatelessTierlet.Result execute(Parameters parameters)
          Executes viewtier.
 
Methods inherited from interface viewtier.ui.Tierlet
getAttribute, getTierletContext, setAttribute
 

Method Detail

execute

public StatelessTierlet.Result execute(Parameters parameters)
Executes viewtier. During execution tierlet can take any action necessary to implement Tierlet task.
Parameters:
parameters - an immutable java.util.Map containing parameter names as keys and parameter values as map values. The keys in the parameter map are of type String. The values in the parameter map are of type String array. Viewtier framework offers convinience class ParameterUtils to simplify parameter processing
See Also:
StatelessTierlet.Result, viewtier.ui.ParameterUtils, Map
